name:
After all the talk of eReaders on @atpfm@mastodon.social and my trouble sleeping lately, I ordered myself a Kobo Libra 2 on the recommendation of @jsnell@zeppelin.flights. I also ordered one of the first party cases.

So far I’m loving it. I couldn’t get any of the Calibre integrations working, so I’m just downloading ePub files from my Calibre server using the web browser, but it works well enough.

summary: @idallas I have a bunch of old Kindle purchases, iBookstore purchases, and DRM-free ePubs. Calibre makes it possible to do conversions and to strip DRM. It’s ugly but works great. In the future I’ll likely use whatever store has things the cheapest 🤪
